title: Power BI Health Analytics
description: Designed KPI-driven dashboards with DAX formulas to evaluate U.S. hospital performance and patient outcomes using publicly available healthcare datasets (2019-2020).

title: YouTube Data Analysis
description: Developed a scalable ETL pipeline with PySpark on AWS to clean and aggregate YouTube engagement data, enabling content optimization through Amazon QuickSight dashboards.

title: Credit Card Fraud Insights Dashboard
description: Built a dynamic Tableau dashboard to visualize fraud trends, conducting data wrangling and outlier detection in Python to support risk analysts in identifying suspicious patterns.

title: Business Performance Tracker
description: Created a real-time KPI monitoring tool with a Flask backend and Power BI frontend, automating dashboard refresh workflows with AWS services to reduce manual report generation by 70%.

title: Logistics Optimization Dashboard
description: Designed interactive Power BI dashboards for real-time transportation performance tracking, enhancing operational efficiency by 25% through data-driven insights and anomaly detection.

title: Automated KPI Reporting System
description: Developed a daily automated KPI email summary using Python and AWS Lambda, streamlining communication across operations teams and standardizing data cleaning to reduce errors by 30%.
